name: Car_Search

pickUpId.description:
Pick-up location
Required: true
pickUpId can be retrieved from /car/auto-complete endpoint(data->id)
Ex: eyJsYXRpdHVkZSI6IjQwLjc1OTU5IiwibG9uZ2l0dWRlIjoiLTczLjk4NDkxIn0=

pickUpDate.description:
Pick-up date
Required: true
Format: YYYY-MM-DD
Ex: 2024-01-25

pickUpTime.description:
Pick-up time
Required: true
Format: HH:MM
Ex: 10:00

dropOffDate.description:
Drop-off date
Required: true
Format: YYYY-MM-DD
Ex: 2024-01-26

dropOffTime.description:
Drop-off time
Required: true
Format: HH:MM
Ex: 10:00

dropOffId.description:
Drop-off location
droOffId can be retrieved from /car/auto-complete endpoint(data->id)
Ex: eyJsYXRpdHVkZSI6IjQwLjc1OTU5IiwibG9uZ2l0dWRlIjoiLTczLjk4NDkxIn0=

sortBy.description:
Sort by
sortBy can be retrieved from this endpoint(data->sort->identifier)
Ex: recommended
Default value: recommended

recommended: Recommended – best first
price_low_to_high: Price - lowest first

carType.description:
Car Type
carType can be retrieved from this endpoint(data->filter(id=carCategory)->categories->id)
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
Ex: carCategory::carriers,carCategory::suvs
Default value: recommended

carCategory::small: Small
carCategory::medium: Medium
carCategory::large: Large
carCategory::premium: Premium
carCategory::carriers: People carriers
carCategory::suvs: SUVs

supplier.description:
Supplier
carType can be retrieved from this endpoint(data->filter(id=supplier)->categories->id)
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
Ex: supplier::Alamo,supplier::Enterprise

transmission.description:
Transmission
transmission can be retrieved from this endpoint(data->filter(id=transmission)->categories->id)
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
Ex: transmission::AUTOMATIC

units.description:
Units
Ex: metric
Default value: metric
Choose one of the values below
metric: Metric (km, m2)
imperial: Imperial (miles, ft2)

languageCode.description:
Language
languageCode can be retrieved from /languages endpoint(data->code)
Ex: en-us
Default value: en-us

currencyCode.description:
Currency
currencyCode can be retrieved from /currencies endpoint(data->code)
Ex: USD
Default value: HOTEL(Property's Currency)

countryFlag.description:
Country
countryFlag can be retrieved from /languages endpoint(data->countryFlag)
Ex: us
Default value: us

pickUpId.description:
Pick-up location
Required: true
pickUpId can be retrieved from /car/auto-complete endpoint(data->id)
Ex: eyJsYXRpdHVkZSI6IjQwLjc1OTU5IiwibG9uZ2l0dWRlIjoiLTczLjk4NDkxIn0=

supplier_info.name: Ace
supplier_info.address: 124-10 South Conduit Avenue, South Ozone Park, Jfk Airport (JFK), USA, 11420
supplier_info.pickup_instructions: Shuttle pick up is available at the Federal Circle. From any terminals please take the Airtrain to Federal Circle. Once you are there please go downstairs to the street level and follow the signs to free shuttles. Once you reach the roundabout with a sign that says: ""Free Shuttles to Off-Airport Hotels and Rental Cars"" please call us at 855-550-0008 to request a pick up.
supplier_info.dropoff_instructions:
Shuttle pick up is available at the Federal Circle. From any terminals please take the Airtrain to Federal Circle. Once you are there please go downstairs to the street level and follow the signs to free shuttles. Once you reach the roundabout with a sign that says: ""Free Shuttles to Off-Airport Hotels and Rental Cars"" please call us at
855-550-0008 to request a pick up.

response_summary:
Here’s a summary of the car rental options available at John F. Kennedy International Airport (JFK) in New York. There are 1,120 results in total, with prices starting from $253 for a 6-day rental. The supplier Ace offers three vehicles with free cancellation and unlimited mileage, all rated 6.0 out of 10 based on 164 reviews.  

First, the **Volkswagen Jetta** is an intermediate car priced at $256.09, seating five passengers with space for three small suitcases. It features an automatic transmission, air conditioning, and a "like for like" fuel policy. The pickup and drop-off location is at JFK, accessible via a shuttle bus from Federal Circle.  

Next, the **Hyundai Elantra** is a standard car costing $263.06, accommodating five people and four small suitcases. Like the Jetta, it has automatic transmission, unlimited mileage, and free cancellation.  

Lastly, the **Hyundai Accent**, an economy car, is available for $252.61. It seats five and fits three small suitcases, with similar features as the other options.  

Other nearby locations include LaGuardia Airport (starting at $321 for 6 days) and Manhattan (from $383). Filters allow sorting by car type (small, medium, large), supplier (Ace, Alamo, Avis), and location type (airport shuttle, in-terminal, downtown). Results can also be sorted by price (lowest first) or review score (highest first).  

For pickup, travelers should take the Airtrain to Federal Circle and follow signs for free shuttles, then call Ace at 855-550-0008 for pickup. A deposit of up to $500 may be required, along with a potential valet fee of $250. All bookings are payable upfront.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers seeking car rentals at specific locations and times. It searches available vehicles based on pickup/drop-off details, with options to filter by car type, supplier, transmission, and amenities like air conditioning. Users receive detailed rental info including pricing, capacity, features, and supplier ratings. Results can be sorted by recommendation or price, aiding in cost-effective travel planning.

enhanced_parameters.pickUpId: Unique identifier for the pickup location, sourced from auto-complete endpoint.
enhanced_parameters.pickUpDate: Date when the car rental begins (YYYY-MM-DD format).
enhanced_parameters.pickUpTime: Time when the car rental begins (24-hour HH:MM format).
enhanced_parameters.dropOffDate: Date when the car rental ends (YYYY-MM-DD format).
enhanced_parameters.dropOffTime: Time when the car rental ends (24-hour HH:MM format).
enhanced_parameters.dropOffId: Unique identifier for the drop-off location, if different from pickup.
enhanced_parameters.sortBy: Sorts results by recommendation or price (low to high).
enhanced_parameters.driverAge: Driver's age, must be between 30 and 65 years.
enhanced_parameters.carType: Filters by car category (e.g., small, SUV, premium).
enhanced_parameters.supplier: Filters by rental company (e.g., Alamo, Enterprise).
enhanced_parameters.hasAirConditioning: Filters for cars with air conditioning (true/false).
enhanced_parameters.languageCode: Language preference for the response data.

content.description: Contains badges, supplier information, and vehicle specifications.

badges.description: List of badges associated with the vehicle (e.g., 'Free cancellation').

text.description: Text displayed on the badge (e.g., 'Free cancellation').

supplier.description: Supplier details including name, logo, and rating.

vehicleSpecs.description: List of vehicle specifications (e.g., transmission type).

unlimited_mileage.description: Indicates if the vehicle has unlimited mileage (1 for true, 0 for false).

special_offer_text.description: Text for any special offers (null if none).

seats.description: Number of seats in the vehicle (e.g., '5').

big.description: Number of big suitcases the vehicle can hold (e.g., '0').

small.description: Number of small suitcases the vehicle can hold (e.g., '3').

label.description: Label describing the vehicle type (e.g., 'Intermediate car with:').

image_thumbnail_url.description: URL of the vehicle's thumbnail image.

group_or_similar.description: Description of the vehicle group or similar (e.g., 'or similar large car').

fuel_policy_description.description: Description of the fuel policy (empty if none).

free_cancellation.description: Indicates if free cancellation is available (1 for true, 0 for false).

cma_compliant.description: Indicates if the vehicle is CMA compliant (-1 for unknown).

aircon.description: Indicates if the vehicle has air conditioning (1 for true, 0 for false).

airbags.description: Indicates if the vehicle has airbags (1 for true, 0 for false).

badges.description: Badges associated with the vehicle (empty if none).

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the supplier's location.

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the supplier's location.

may_require_credit_card_guarantee.description: Indicates if a credit card guarantee may be required (true/false).

route_info.description: Information about pickup and dropoff locations.

name.description: Name of the pickup location (e.g., 'John F Kennedy International Airport').

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the pickup location.

location_id.description: Unique identifier for the pickup location (e.g., '41721').

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the pickup location.

icon.description: Icon representing the pickup location (empty if none).

country_code.description: Country code of the pickup location (e.g., 'US').

country.description: Country name of the pickup location (empty if none).

address.description: Physical address of the pickup location.

city.description: City of the pickup location (empty if none).

name.description: Name of the dropoff location (e.g., 'John F Kennedy International Airport').

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the dropoff location.

location_id.description: Unique identifier for the dropoff location (e.g., '41721').

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the dropoff location.

icon.description: Icon representing the dropoff location (empty if none).

country_code.description: Country code of the dropoff location (e.g., 'US').

country.description: Country name of the dropoff location (empty if none).

address.description: Physical address of the dropoff location.

city.description: City of the dropoff location (empty if none).

rating_info.description: Rating details for the vehicle and supplier.

average_text.description: Text description of the average rating (e.g., 'Good').

currency.description: Currency for the fee (empty if none).

drive_away_price_before.description: Previous drive away price (null if none).

drive_away_price_is_approx.description: Indicates if the drive away price is approximate (true/false).

quote_allowed.description: Indicates if a quote is allowed (1 for true, 0 for false).

amount.description: Amount associated with the fuel policy (e.g., 0.0).

currency.description: Currency for the fuel policy (empty if none).

distance_allowed.description: Allowed distance for the fee (null if none).

is_always_payable.description: Indicates if the fee is always payable (1 for true, 0 for false).

is_tax_included.description: Indicates if tax is included (1 for true, 0 for false).

currency.description: Currency for the fee (null if none).

fuel_policy.description: Fuel policy description (e.g., 'Fuel policy is: Like for like').

supplier_rating.description: Supplier rating description (e.g., 'At this location, our customers have rated Ace as 6.0 out of 10, OK.').

pick_up_location.description: Pickup location description (e.g., 'Pick-up information: Shuttle Bus').

applied_discount_types.description: List of applied discount types (empty if none).

forward_url.description: URL for forwarding to booking details.

discountBanner.description: Indicates that there is no discount banner currently active.

dsaBanner.description: Indicates that there is no DSA (Dynamic Search Ads) banner currently active.

items.description: A list of items in the response, such as result counts or other metadata.

ar_items.description: An object representing an item in the list.

positionInList.description: The position of the item in the list (e.g., 0 for the first item).

label.description: A label describing the content (e.g., '1120 results').

countLabel.description: A label indicating the number of results (e.g., '1120 results').

map.description: An object containing map-related information, including supplier locations.

ar_items.description: An object representing a supplier location.

carouselContent.description: Content displayed in a carousel for the location.

title.description: The title of the location (e.g., 'John F Kennedy International Airport').

body.description: The address of the location (e.g., '124-10 South Conduit Avenue, South Ozone Park, Jfk Airport (JFK), USA, 11420').

label.description: A label summarizing the location (e.g., '160 cars · 14 suppliers').
A label indicating the price for a rental period (e.g., 'Price for 6 days: from $253').

price.description: The price for the rental period (e.g., '$253').

supplierPinContent.description: Content displayed on a map pin for the supplier location.

label.description: The price label for the location (e.g., '$253').

latLong.description: The latitude and longitude coordinates of the location.

locationName.description: The name of the location (e.g., 'John F Kennedy International Airport').

title.description: The title of the filter category (e.g., 'Location').

id.description: A unique identifier for the filter category (e.g., 'depotLocationType').

layout.description: Configuration details for the layout of the filter.

is_collapsable.description: Indicates whether the filter can be collapsed (e.g., 'false').

is_collapsed.description: Indicates whether the filter is currently collapsed (e.g., 'false').

collapsed_count.description: The number of items that would be displayed if the filter were collapsed (e.g., 4).

layout_type.description: The type of layout used for the filter (e.g., 'list').

categories.description: A list of filter categories available under this filter.

ar_items.description: An object representing a filter category.

id.description: A unique identifier for the category (e.g., 'depotLocationType::DOWNTOWN').

name.description: The display name of the category (e.g., 'All other locations').

nameWithCount.description: The display name of the category along with the count of items (e.g., 'All other locations (662)').

count.description: The number of items available in this category (e.g., 662).

name.description: The display name of the sorting option (e.g., 'Recommended – best first').

identifier.description: A unique identifier for the sorting option (e.g., 'recommended').

title_tag.description: A tag or label associated with the sorting option, possibly for localization or UI purposes (e.g., 'tr.searchresults.sortBy.recommended').

searchKey.description: A base64-encoded search key containing parameters like driver's age, pickup/drop-off dates, location coordinates, rental duration, and service features.

searchId.description: A unique identifier (UUID) for the search session, used to track or reference this specific search query.

recommendationsSearchUniqueId.description: A unique identifier (UUID) for the recommendations generated from this search, used to retrieve or update the recommendations.

discount_banner.description: Indicates that no discount banner is currently active or applicable for the car rental search.

search_key.description: A base64-encoded search key containing parameters such as driver's age, pickup and drop-off dates and times, location coordinates, rental duration, and service features.

count.description: The number of car rental options available in the current search results (e.g., 500).

is_genius_location.description: Indicates whether the pickup location is part of the Genius loyalty program (false in this case).

The data types match (both are strings), and there is a potential business association where a traveler might want to rent a car near an attraction they are visiting.

The 'dropOffTime' parameter in the target API requires a specific car rental drop-off time (24-hour format). The source API's 'checkout' field in hotel results provides checkout times (e.g., 'until': '11:00'). While the data types differ (object vs time), the time portion can be extracted. This creates a potential business association where a traveler might want to drop off their rental car around the same time they check out from their hotel.

The 'dropOffTime' parameter in the target API requires a specific car rental return time (24-hour format). The source API's 'close' field in restaurant operating hours provides closing times (e.g., '23:00:00'). While the data types differ (timestamp vs time), the time portion can be extracted. This creates a potential business association where a traveler might want to return their rental car after dining at a restaurant.
